rows.label: tlk43400542_04_msg0001
rows.name:
If you've come looking for good
news, you're dang out of luck.

rows.label: tlk43400542_04_msg0002
rows.name:
All the countries' Divine
Beasts are battered and
ragged with the fighting...

rows.label: tlk43400542_04_msg0003
rows.name:
And with all the people that
escaped from Acedia, our
tempers are fraying too...

rows.label: tlk43400542_04_msg0004
rows.name:
I wish I could say I saw a silver
lining to this cloud, but I can't.
Not in good conscience, anyway.

rows.label: tlk43400542_04_msg0005
rows.name:
It may sound rough, but all we
can do is try to wait it out.
These are trying times, for sure.

rows.label: tlk43400542_04_msg0006
rows.name:
At least when they eat at
our restaurant the people
can relax a smidgen.
